head.title: No More Beer in the Bleachers

hedline.hl1: No More Beer in the Bleachers

abstract.p: New York Yankees announce that concession stands in bleachers in Yankee Stadium will stop selling beer when team begins weekend series against Boston Red Sox next Friday (S)

block.p: There are 5,502 bleacher seats at Yankee Stadium, and beginning next Friday night, they will be a relatively inexpensive place to watch baseball but not a place to drink beer.

The Yankees announced yesterday that concession stands in the bleachers will stop selling beer when the team begins a weekend series next Friday against the Boston Red Sox. Beer restrictions had already been imposed on the $8 seats last season, when beer vendors stopped roaming that part of the stadium.
